full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RIG BYED LHA MO'I TSOGS MCHOD RMAD BYUNG DON YOD ZHAGS PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES RIG BYED LHA MO'I TSOGS MCHOD RMAD BYUNG DON YOD ZHAGS PA ZHES BYA BA @006B 'DI NI SRID ZHES GTZUG RGYAN ^RGYAL DBANG MCHOG GI SPRUL PA'I SKU'I ZHABS 'BRING SKU BCAD NANG LA LUGS GNYIS ZUNG DU 'JUG PA'I RNAM DPYOD MCHOG TU YANGS PA MKHAN PO BLO BZANG DGE 'DUN NAS BSKUL MA MDZAD PA LTAR ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS PHO BRANG CHEN PO PO TA LAR SUG BRIS SU SBYAR BA'O,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES,
